children.value: We were mandated to design and develop a styleguide for the new web platform of Le Temps, a prestigious Swiss french speaking newspaper. After a big focus on the typography, we also optimize the performances of the frontend to offer a great experience for slow connection users.

markdownRemark.excerpt: We were mandated to design and develop a styleguide for the new web platform of Le Temps, a prestigious Swiss french speaking newspaper. After a big focus on the typography, we also optimize the performances of the frontend to offer a great experience for slow connection users.
